Precondition: "Retrieve order with tickets and event details (Normal)"
"Handle order with very long order ID (Boundary)"
"Handle event scheduled far in future - 1 year (Boundary)"
"Return error when user is not authenticated (Abnormal)"
"Return error when order ID does not exist (Abnormal)"
"Return error when user tries to access another user's order (Abnormal)"
"Return error when user role is not customer (Abnormal)"
"Return error when order ID is invalid UUID format (Abnormal)"
"Handle malformed order ID with special characters (Abnormal)"
"Handle SQL injection attempt in order ID (Abnormal)"
"⚠️ WARNING - Past event order has no status indicator (UX Issue)"
"⚠️ WARNING - Refunded tickets but order status completed (Data Integrity)"
"⚠️ WARNING - Order age exceeds 10 years - data retention (Compliance)"
Type(N : Normal, A : Abnormal, B : Boundary)
